para.literal: node-set xsh:context(node-set NODE, float BEFORE, float AFTER)

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Returns a node-set of sibling nodes surrounding NODE. The span consists of (up to) BEFORE-many nodes immediately preceding NODE, the NODE itself, and (up to) AFTER-many nodes immediately following NODE. If the AFTER is not given, AFTER is set equal to BEFORE.
